data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Ad hoc, is something that one can use to do a specific task but the process that was used cannot be used for another process. It's ____ doing ____ work ____ the ____ no ____ planning ____ required. The ____ project ____ not ____ at ____ level. One ____ use a template ____ create a project ____ with Ad Hoc, it ____ not ____. As whole the the term "Ad hoc" means for this purpose only.
data.partBlankContent: Ad hoc, is something that one can use to do a specific task but the process that was used cannot be used for another process. It's li__ doing so__ work o_ the f__ no ma___ planning i_ required. The wh___ project c__ not r__ at th__ level. One c__ use a template t_ create a project b__ with Ad Hoc, it i_ not poss____. As whole the the term "Ad hoc" means for this purpose only.
data.fullContent: Ad hoc, is something that one can use to do a specific task but the process that was used cannot be used for another process. It's like doing some work on the fly no major planning is required. The whole project can not run at that level. One can use a template to create a project but with Ad Hoc, it is not possible. As whole the the term "Ad hoc" means for this purpose only.
data.answer: “临时性的工作”是指可以用来完成特定任务的工作，但是所使用的进程不能被用于另一个进程。这就像忙碌中做的一些工作，不需要主计划。整个项目并不能在那个层面上运行。我们可以使用模板创建项目，但不可能用临时性的工作来创建。就整体而言，“临时性的工作”一词指仅为此目的而设的工作。
